title: About Me
section_about_p1: Full Stack Developer with strong experience in building modern, user-focused web applications using Next.js, React, Java, C#, and SQL databases. Highly skilled in developing reliable backend systems and scalable frontends with a focus on clean architecture and performance.
section_about_p2: A fast learner with hands-on experience integrating software into real business workflows. Highly motivated to contribute to solutions that improve patient onboarding, insurance processing, and digital healthcare services.

experience.title: Software Developer
experience.description: Designed and developed a payment gateway and web platforms using Next.js, PHP (Yii), and Django REST API. Built and optimized backend/frontend systems (speed, security, UI/UX). Managed server infrastructure (VPS, Nginx, Docker, PM2) and applied Agile/CI/CD workflows.

experience.title: Software Developer
experience.description: Developed and enhanced core banking modules (reporting, remittance, trade finance systems). Improved reporting performance using C#, Java, SSRS, and ETL pipelines. Optimized SQL queries, reducing data processing time and increasing system reliability.

education: Bachelor of Science in Computer Software Technology Engineering, University of Applied Science and Technology (UAST), Iran
Statistics and Data Analytics Student, University of Vienna, Austria
gdpr_consent: I agree to the storage and processing of my personal data in accordance with the GDPR for the purpose of the application procedure.
